name.zh: 拼色迷你托特包（多颜色）

description.en: A compact two-tone mini tote with a structured shape and everyday practicality. Features a roomy main compartment and top closure hardware—ideal for daily carry and light shopping. OEM/ODM customization available for fabrics (including recycled options), color blocking, logo patch, lining, pockets, hardware, and packaging.
description.zh: 拼色迷你托特包，包型挺括，小巧但实用。主仓空间充足，并带顶部扣件闭合，适合日常随身与轻购物使用。支持 OEM/ODM 定制：面料（可选再生环保材料）、拼色方案、Logo 工艺、内里、口袋结构、五金与包装等。

en: Outer: Canvas-like fabric / Polyester / Nylon (customizable; recycled options available)
Logo: Woven label / rubber patch / embroidery / leather patch (customizable)
zh: 面料：类帆布面料/涤纶/尼龙（可定制；可选再生环保材料）
底部拼色：撞色拼布面料（可定制）
闭合方式：按扣/磁吸扣（可定制）
Logo：织标/胶章/刺绣/皮标（可定制）

en.Customization: Fabric, color blocking, logo, lining, pocket layout, hardware, packaging

zh.适用场景: 日常随身、轻购物、午餐/小物收纳
zh.可定制: 面料配色、拼色方案、Logo、内里、口袋结构、五金、包装
